mapper.select: select ds_id , name , use_type , linktype , linkurl , uname, name as jndi_name from etl_datasource
mapper.insert: insert into etl_datasource(ds_Id, name, use_type, linktype, linkurl, uname, psd) values(#{dsid}, #{dsname}, #{use}, #{linkType}, #{linkUrl}, #{linkName}, #{linkPwd})
mapper.update: update etl_datasource set name=#{dsname}, use_type = #{use}, linktype = #{linkType}, linkurl=#{linkUrl}, uname = #{linkName}, psd = #{linkPwd} where ds_id = #{dsid}
